Shows as soon as I try to load the page (MacOSX 10.5.8, Safari) shows me the loading screen afterwards but nothing happens.

Comments.Message: Tried it on google Chrome just now and it works there
You've somehow managed to specifically deny Rawr3 from having permission to store data on your computer. Goto your Silverlight settings, and delete the saved settings for Rawr3.
The permissions list is empty in silverlight settings
Look on the Application Storage tab. Make sure Enable Application Storage is checked. Delete all there. Remove all on the Permissions tab.
Deleted Rawr from the Application Storage and it's still enabled, Permissions tab is still empty, still doesnt work with Safari
Are you still experiencing this problem?
